meanings.sent1: The general was spearheading the charge against the enemy.
meanings.sent2: She is spearheading the team's effort to win the game.
meanings.sent3: The fearless knight spearheading the quest tripped over his own feet.
meanings.sent4: The young activist spearheading the protest was a beacon of hope for the community.
meanings.sent5: The captain spearheading the rescue mission inspired his crew with his bravery.

meanings.definition: Act as the leader or driving force.
meanings.sent1: The CEO is spearheading the company's expansion into new markets.
meanings.sent2: He spearheaded the campaign to raise funds for the charity.
meanings.sent3: The cat, spearheading the escape plan, got distracted by a shiny object.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for the cause spearheaded the movement for change.
meanings.sent5: The teacher spearheading the school play brought out the best in the students.

meanings.definition: Initiate or launch a new project or initiative.
meanings.sent1: The entrepreneur is spearheading a groundbreaking new technology.
meanings.sent2: They are spearheading the effort to revitalize the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel, spearheading the nut-gathering mission, got lost in the park.
meanings.sent4: His vision spearheaded the development of the innovative product.
meanings.sent5: The artist spearheading the community art project inspired creativity in everyone involved.
